channel.title: Joaquín L. Pereyra
channel.description: I talk way too often about Vim, Linux, Python, vulnerabilities and weird languages. I live in Argentina and work as a Web Security Engineer at Mercado Libre.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: So, I’m getting into blogging. Again. Like it’s 2010. This time I went with Github pages (which is free) + hubpress (which is hassle free). Plus, I can now blog with Markdown! YEAH BOY.
item.dc:creator: Joaquín L. Pereyra
